title: Radio Massacre International 2001 Planets In The Wires
description: Radio Massacre International ~ Planets In The Wires ~ 2001 Northern Echo Recordings NE 007. http://i1.imageban.ru/out/2017/08/12/cda54f35c616259147f7fa938d4d3a75.jpg 1 Planets In The Wires 29:33 2 Echoes 44:30 his first non CDR release on our own label, features material recorded in April 2001, at a single session by Duncan and Steve and overdubbed under similar time constraints by Gary in Manchester. We have always embraced the "on the day" approach to recording believing that a certain magic of occasion is captured in the process. We left the pieces long this time, the wonder of compact disc is that it allows for both quality and quantity. Each piece has a rhythmic section driven by sequencers and drum machine, as well as long meditative excursions into the heart of darkness. The title is a phrase grabbed from an undisclosed TV show, which is both a direct reference to the physics involved in the music we make and an apt description of the end result. 'Echoes' was named due to the accidental but obvious Pink Floyd reference in this track, and also because everybody has a piece called 'Echoes' somewhere in their catalogue. This is ours. - RMI
